passage:
The three Y-wing fighters race toward camera and zoom
      overhead through a hail of laserfire.

307

Gold Leader pulls his computer targeting device down in
      front of his eye. Laserbolts continue to batter the Rebel
      craft.

                          GOLD LEADER
                Switching to targeting computer.

308

Gold Two, a younger pilot about Luke's age, pulls down his
      targeting eye viewer and adjusts it. His ship shudders under
      intense laser barrage.

                          GOLD TWO
                Computer's locked. Getting a
                signal.

      As the fighters begin to approach the target area, suddenly
      all the laserfire stops. An eerie clam clings over the
      trench as the surface whips past in a blur.

                          GOLD TWO (CONTâ€™D)
                The guns... they've stopped!

309

Gold Five looks behind him.

                          GOLD FIVE
                Stabilize your read deflectors.
                Watch for enemy fighters.

310

GOLD LEADER
                They've coming in! Three marks at
                two ten.

311

Three Imperial TIE ships, Darth Vader in the center flanked
      by two wingmen, dive in precise formation almost vertically
      toward the Death Star surface.

312

Darth Vader calmly adjusts his control stick as the stars
      zoom by.

                          VADER
                I'll take them myself! Cover me!

                          WINGMAN'S VOICE
                    (over speaker)
                Yes, sir.

313

Three TIE fighters zoom across the surface of the Death
      Star.

314

Vader lines up Gold Two in his targeting computer. Vader's
      hands grip the control stick as he presses the button.

315

The cockpit explodes around Gold Two. His head falls
      forward.

316
